ViewObject.Name: ApprovalDashView
ViewObject.SQLQuery: SELECT Proposal.PROPOSAL_ID FROM FOCUSPP.PROPOSAL Proposal, FOCUSPP.DOC_APPROVAL DocApproval, FOCUSPP.APPROVAL_REG_PROP ApprovalRegProp WHERE Proposal.PROPOSAL_ID = DocApproval.PROPOSAL_ID AND Proposal.COMPANY_ID = :compId AND Proposal.STATUS IN ('INPROCESS', 'REJECTED') AND ApprovalRegProp.PROPOSAL_ID = Proposal.PROPOSAL_ID AND ApprovalRegProp.PROPOSAL_ID = DocApproval.PROPOSAL_ID AND DocApproval.ACTION IS NULL AND DocApproval.ROLE_NAME = :roleName AND ApprovalRegProp.REGION_CODE IN (SELECT AUR.REGION_CODE FROM FOCUSPP.APP_USER_REGION AUR WHERE AUR.USER_NAME = :userName) GROUP BY Proposal.PROPOSAL_ID
